key.name: directory-template
key.description:
All directories will be created within the top-level session directory according to the specified template. You can use variables for substituting context-specific values.
Available variables: {sample}, {group}, {container}, {position}, {port}, {date}, {activity}.

key.name: screening-method
key.description:
Analysis method for screening images. The default is 'AutoProcess'.
Allowed: 'AutoProcess', 'MOSFLM'.
